contentList.content: Kanalas utilize powerful gifts given to them by a creature, object, or intangible force that has become incorporated into their very bodies and souls.
A hardened leather surcoat that's heavier than it looks.
Your gift supplies you with a locus of power that allows you to empower your weapons.
Use your locus to imbue the weapon in your main hand with elemental power. It deals an additional 1d4 damage of your choice.
Imbue a weapon with corrosive energy. It deals an additional [1].
Imbue a weapon with freezing energy. It deals an additional [1].
Imbue a weapon with burning energy. It deals an additional [1].
Imbue a weapon with electricity. It deals an additional [1].
Imbue a weapon with booming energy. It deals an additional [1].
